nodes.text: The Royal Guard Champions were the most skilled warriors within the Emperor's Royal Guard and given only the most dangerous missions to complete. The uniforms of Royal Guard Champions were similar in appearance to the standard garb of the Galactic Empire's Royal Guard, although with several distinctions. Namely, they possessed a black chest-plate and gauntlets, the front of their helmets were also colored black while the remaining was red, and they wore a black cape. They wielded the deadly double-bladed vibrosword.
